arguments: {"scriptId":{"name":"org.jolokia.extra.addon.scripting.test.VersionTest","version":"1.0.1"},"meta":{"description":"check version call through BackendManager","author":"MM"},"vars":{},"collectionItems":[{"var":"info","type":"version"}],"assertions":[],"conditional":{"check":"info.product.toLowerCase() == 'tomcat' && info.version.substring(0,1) == '7'","description":"Check that the Tomcat Version is 7.","collectionItems":[{"var":"info","type":"version"}]}}
